description: Numbers n such that floor(Pi*n) is prime.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) je=[]; for(n=0,1000, if(isprime(floor(Pi*n)),je=concat(je,n),)); je(PARI) { default(realprecision, 50); n=-1; for (m=1, 10^5, if (isprime(floor(Pi*m)), write("b062408.txt", n++, " ", m); if (n==1000, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 08 2001
